## PackageJsonEditor.resolutionsList property

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

This field is a Yarn-specific feature that allows overriding of package resolution.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get resolutionsList(): ReadonlyArray<PackageJsonDependency>;
```

## Remarks

See the [0000-selective-versions-resolutions.md RFC](https://github.com/yarnpkg/rfcs/blob/master/implemented/0000-selective-versions-resolutions.md) for details.
